Reviews.Title: its not good or bad
Reviews.Author: bobby
Reviews.Content: this phone works excellent every thing works fine but the housing scratches very easy and the battery lasts about 3-4 days but after a few years the battery dies in less than an hour with no use

Reviews.Title: Blackberry is dead
Reviews.Author: nthany
Reviews.Content: Too expensiveTrack pad came badNo USB cablePoor build qualityBad cameraDisappointed with this purchaseDO NOT BUYBetter options such as the Lumia 520, 620 within this price range.

Reviews.Title: rodney bucan
Reviews.Author: Rodney Rafael Bucan V
Reviews.Content: excelente producto muy bueno lo recomiendo y sobre todo llego en el tiempo establecido por el vendedor y excelente presio,,,

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!!
Reviews.Author: A. Fuentes "An Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone on September 12 and it stopped working on December 09 for no reason....it is a piece of crap and of course I can't return it cause I had it for almost 3 months....Mind you, the phone was used maybe 2 or 3 times a day for a few minutes at a time since I'm usually in class or at work from morning to night.
